text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Hostomel | native_name = Гостомель | native_name_lang = uk | settlement_type = Town | image_flag = Прапор Гостомеля.png | image_shield = Герб Гостомельської ОТГ.png | image_skyline = Bucha park12.JPG | image_alt = View of Hostomel | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Oblast | subdivision_name1 = Kyiv |subdivision_type2 = Raion |subdivision_name2 = Bucha | established_title = First reference | established_date = | established_title1 = | established_date1 = | area_land_km2 = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 17534 | population_as_of = 2021 | postal_code_type = Postal code| | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | website = }} Hostomel () is a city in Kyiv Oblast, northwest of the capital city of Kyiv. Hostomel was badly damaged during the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine. "Fire reported in many buildings in Ukraine's Hostomel", India Today, 6 March 2022 Russian troops lost a battle at the Hostomel airport. The city was given the title Hero City of Ukraine on 13 March 2022. ==References== Category:Cities in Kyiv Oblast
title: Hostomel
